entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
